== Ozone ==
Relevance to
** <nowiki>[[Lubuntu | Lubuntu]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[Lubuntu-Artwork | Artwork]]</nowiki>

=== Concept ===

Ozone3 gets stable. Using only Clearlooks and Unico engines we ensure compatibility and speed, due to Cairo rendering improvements. The optimization of the theme for this release is the main goal for Lubuntu artwork, but without sacrifying eye-candy!

<nowiki>[[ attachment:capture.png | <nowiki>[[File:capture_mini.png]]</nowiki></nowiki> ]]

=== Theme ===
Ozone3 is inspired on Sammy by <nowiki>[[http://gnome-look.org/usermanager/search.php?username=untouchable89|Андрей Твердов]]</nowiki> (Andrey Tverdov) (GPL2 license) and Radiance by <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~cimi|Andrea Cimitan]]</nowiki>, using Clearlooks engine for GTK2 and Unico for GTK3. The theme is finished, just doing maintenance updates. Download beta version <nowiki>[[attachment:ozone3_theme.tar.gz|archive]]</nowiki> (50 kb).

=== Icons ===
Elementary Icons by <nowiki>[[http://www.elementary-project.com/|Dan Rabbit]]</nowiki>. Additional monochrome tray icons by <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~frankbooth | frankbooth]]</nowiki>.

Keyboard layout flags for LXpanel, based on the idea of <nowiki>[[http://gnome-look.org/usermanager/search.php?username=scottiw2000 | Ian Scott]]</nowiki>, can be downloaded <nowiki>[[attachment:lubuntu-lxpanel-flags.tar.gz|here]]</nowiki>.

Keyboard LED indicators for LXpanel can be downloaded <nowiki>[[attachment:lubuntu-lxpanel-locks.tar.gz|here]]</nowiki>.

Additional Elementary icons, consisting of monochrome panel icons for: Audacious, Gnome-Mplayer & Pidgin, can be downloaded <nowiki>[[attachment:lubuntu-elementary-extras.tar.gz|here]]</nowiki>. (''please note that gnome-mplayer-panel.svg won't work unless patch r2186 is applied'')
